description:
A young samurai seeks revenge.  A demon granny stalks the plains of Adachigahara. The sun and moon take a trip down to see the lower world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ushikawamaru / Adachigahara no Onibaba / Tsukihi no Tatsu no wa Hayai
Ushiwakamaru / The Demon Granny of Adachigahara / The Days Fly By
牛若丸 / 安達ヶ原の鬼婆 / 月日のたつのは早い
